title: Lamb shanks with red wine sauce
ingredients: ['6 lamb shanks, trimmed', '2 medium carrots, finely chopped', '2 onions, finely chopped', '1 clove garlic, finely chopped', '2 tbsp finely chopped fresh rosemary', '2 tbsp finely chopped fresh thyme', '1 bay leaf', '375ml beef stock', '250ml red wine']
